description:
Tax Rebellion aimed at the Greater London Authority (GLA) calling on them to act in accordance with the Mayor of London’s declaration of climate emergency
Rebels will assemble outside GLA offices to deliver a letter to the Mayor of London and the GLA. Londoners will be asked to withhold 22% of one month’s council tax – the average proportion which would go to the GLA.
location: Great London Authority City Hall, London, UK.
name: Extinction Rebellion

description: Hunger Strike for People and Planet: This action aims to highlight how millions are already living through the hell of our #PlanetaryCrisis. Migrant justice and the rights of indigenous peoples must be put at the heart of efforts to end the climate and ecological breakdown.
name: Extinction Rebellion

description: NVDA against NYC Pipeline! We will state a peaceful NVDA at the NYC Pipeline with the demand to have it shut down.
name: Extinction Rebellion

description: Say not to German Coal Mine! We will strike aganist the proposal to build a new coal mine here in Germany and demand that the government refuse the proposal and divest from fossil fuels.
name: Extinction Rebellion

description: Tacoma Pipeline Shutdown. We will state a peaceful NVDA at the Tacoma Pipeline with the demand to have it shut down.
name: Extinction Rebellion

description: Citywide Strike for Brazil! We will be striking for the climate at specified locations around the city to demand the protection of the Amazon rainfaorest.
location: Various Locations, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
name: Extinction Rebellion
